changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.coordinate_kind_definition ( id bigserial NOT NULL, -- Otherwise meaningless identifier for a definition rule kind bigint NOT NULL, -- The kind of coordinate this definition rule pertains to sequence_number ruleform.sequence_number NOT NULL, -- The sequential order of this definition rule among all rules applying to this kind of coordinate attribute bigint, -- An Attribute defined as part of the internal structure of this kind of coordinate subordinate_coordinate_kind bigint, -- Another kind of coordinate defined as part of the internal structure of this kind of coordinate notes character varying, -- Usage notes for this definition rule research bigint, -- A research flag that has been set on an individual rule updated_by bigint NOT NULL, -- The agency that last updated this rule update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, -- The time at which this rule was last updated CONSTRAINT coordinate_kind_definition_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT coordinate_kind_definition_attribute_fkey FOREIGN KEY (attribute) REFERENCES ruleform.attribute (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT coordinate_kind_definition_kind_fkey FOREIGN KEY (kind) REFERENCES ruleform.coordinate_kind (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT coordinate_kind_definition_research_fkey FOREIGN KEY (research) REFERENCES ruleform.research (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT coordinate_kind_definition_subordinate_coordinate_kind_fkey FOREIGN KEY (subordinate_coordinate_kind) REFERENCES ruleform.coordinate_kind (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT coordinate_kind_definition_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT coordinate_kind_definition_kind_key UNIQUE (kind , sequence_number ), CONSTRAINT valid_definition CHECK ((ruleform.null_zero(attribute) + ruleform.null_zero(subordinate_coordinate_kind)) = 1) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); COMMENT ON TABLE ruleform.coordinate_kind_definition IS 'Describes the internal structure of a kind of coordinate'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_kind_definition.id IS 'Otherwise meaningless identifier for a definition rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_kind_definition.kind IS 'The kind of coordinate this definition rule pertains to'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_kind_definition.sequence_number IS 'The sequential order of this definition rule among all rules applying to this kind of coordinate'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_kind_definition.attribute IS 'An Attribute defined as part of the internal structure of this kind of coordinate'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_kind_definition.subordinate_coordinate_kind IS 'Another kind of coordinate defined as part of the internal structure of this kind of coordinate'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_kind_definition.notes IS 'Usage notes for this definition rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_kind_definition.research IS 'A research flag that has been set on an individual rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_kind_definition.updated_by IS 'The agency that last updated this rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.coordinate_kind_definition.update_date IS 'The time at which this rule was last updated';
